attributes.action: Do not roll out any form of Immunity/Vaccination Certification
attributes.additional_details: We have struggled for over a year with this pandemic and we want to get back go our freedom, vaccination/immunity certification is an impediment on our freedoms and simply should not be rolled out, those that don't take the vaccine shouldn't be punished by being refused entry into a bar, restaurant or place of leisure should they not have the vaccine, this is a backdoor to increase uptake in a vaccine that people may not want to take.
attributes.background: Do not implement Vaccine/Covid Immunity in establishments such as bars, restaurants, a place of leisure, and make it illegal for these establishments to do so.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not rollout Covid-19 vaccine passports: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
